posts.post_title: FS - 2 Graded Polar Bears - Both cards have sold
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have these two T206 Polar Bears for sale.

T206 Frank Delehanty PSA 3 - $55 - *sold*

Post or PM if you are interested.

Thanks
